title: Europe - All Alcohol Consumption Frequencies, GDP, Healthy Life Expectancy (2014 & 2019)
description: Cross-referenced Eurostat data: for each European country, all available alcohol consumption frequencies (total population, natives), GDP per capita, and healthy life expectancy at birth, for the years 2014 and 2019.

columns.sex: Sex (M = male, F = female, T = total)
columns.alcohol_less_than_once_a_month_pct: Percentage of people: 'Less than once a month'
columns.alcohol_not_in_the_last_12_months_pct: Percentage of people: 'Not in the last 12 months'
columns.alcohol_never_or_not_in_the_last_12_mont: Percentage of people: 'Never or not in the last 12 months'
columns.gdp_per_capita: Real GDP per capita in Purchasing Power Standard (PPS)
columns.healthy_life_expectancy: Healthy life expectancy at birth (in years)
